mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.test_data_main_id AS "testDataMain.id", a.name AS "name", a.phone AS "phone", a.job AS "job", a.post AS "post", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN czz_awh b ON b.id = a.test_data_main_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO czz_awh_dt2( id, test_data_main_id, name, phone, job, post, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{testDataMain.id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{job}, #{post}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE czz_awh_dt2 SET test_data_main_id = #{testDataMain.id}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, job = #{job}, post = #{post}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
